verses.name: Leviticus 24:19
verses.text: And if a man cause a blemish in his neighbour; as he hath done, so shall it be done to him;

verses.name: Leviticus 24:20
verses.text: Breach for breach, eye for eye, tooth for tooth: as he hath caused a blemish in a man, so shall it be done to him again.

verses.name: Leviticus 24:21
verses.text: And he that killeth a beast, he shall restore it: and he that killeth a man, he shall be put to death.

verses.name: Leviticus 24:22
verses.text: Ye shall have one manner of law, as well for the stranger, as for one of your own country: for I am the Lord your God.
